title: call a JS function in HTML
body:
You need to create an Ajax Request for this:

  1. In PHP build a JSON with the information you need to receive in the view
  2. Create an Ajax call (get) pointing to the URL that builds the JSON
  3. Inject the JSON object into your code like this $.plot("#visitor-chart", [ data ]);

And that should be it :)

Of course that you need to make sure that the JSON comes EXACTLY in the same format that the chart is expecting.

;)
